PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2011-02632011-03-03,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActExcise Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Various GST/HST Regulations, No. 2
PrecisRegulations Amending Various GST/HST REGULATIONS, NO. 2, in order to formalize and give legal force to the measures related to provincial tax policy flexibility of Ontario, Nova Scotia and British Columbia as well as introduce other rules required to accommodate the elements of provincial tax policy flexibility permitted under the new harmonized value-added tax system.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0056 Publication Date: 2011-03-16
AttachmentsAttachment
